meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Commelina, typically with blue flowers that bloom during the day.
meanings.sent1: The dayflower in the garden looked beautiful under the sun.
meanings.sent2: I love how the dayflower brightens up our yard during daylight.
meanings.sent3: The dayflower seemed to wave at me as I passed by.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as radiant as a dayflower in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The delicate petals of the dayflower danced in the gentle breeze.
